name: Mt. Mushroom (For One)
desc: Varesa's specialty. The young lady, with all the air of a bright pink marshmallow, effortlessly serves this mountainous dish with one hand. The fragrance of mushrooms, mingling with cheese, has you reaching for your cutlery before you even know it. Hey, umm... Is it even possible to finish eating this much food in a day?

customize.name: Recipe: Cheesy Mushroom Skewer
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Cheesy Mushroom Skewer.

customize.name: Cheesy Mushroom Skewer
customize.desc: A skewer covered in mouth-watering cheese. The caps of Red Berryshrooms are removed, filled with a generous sprinkling of cheese, and then grilled to perfection. The rich aroma carries a faint fruity tang best enjoyed while hot.

customize.name: Varesa
customize.desc: A laid-back orchard manager and warrior of the Collective of Plenty. An aspiring hero who hungers for justice... and lots and lots of food!

customize.name: Mt. Mushroom (For One)
customize.desc: Varesa's specialty. The young lady, with all the air of a bright pink marshmallow, effortlessly serves this mountainous dish with one hand. The fragrance of mushrooms, mingling with cheese, has you reaching for your cutlery before you even know it. Hey, umm... Is it even possible to finish eating this much food in a day?

customize.name: Red Berryshroom
customize.desc:
[Version 1]

An ordinary-looking mushroom with an extraordinary flavor. Only grows near the orchard at Varesa's house. Since Paimon gave it a cute name, its taste must have been truly memorable for her.

[Version 2]

Complete Tribal Chronicles: "Collective of Plenty" - Mushroom Realm Mystery

Although these mushrooms are alter egos of the mushroom god, they won't grow forever and are harmless to consume. Thus, they make for high-quality ingredients.

customize.name: Grainfruit
customize.desc: This plant is named after the giant grains that grow along the cob.

customize.name: Cheese
customize.desc: Made from fermented milk. High in energy, it's used in a wide range of dishes.

value.text: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 16% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
